channel.title: Comments on: GigaOM : Â» How To Build A Bullet Proof Start-Up

item.title: By: Dermod Moore
item.dc:creator: Dermod Moore
item.description:
I found it interesting but I could not relate to it at all; as my project is web based, some pointers are not relevant, but I'm not sure, even taking that into consideration, how that could help someone trying to set up a web-based business in Ireland.
I'd love to see a similar article written by an Irish company about how to start in Ireland, for the Irish market. I'm thinking of the property sites like myhome.ie and daft.ie - yes, they are riding the property wave, but how did they start, for example?
item.content:encoded:
I found it interesting but I could not relate to it at all; as my project is web based, some pointers are not relevant, but I’m not sure, even taking that into consideration, how that could help someone trying to set up a web-based business in Ireland.

I’d love to see a similar article written by an Irish company about how to start in Ireland, for the Irish market. I’m thinking of the property sites like myhome.ie and daft.ie – yes, they are riding the property wave, but how did they start, for example?
